trans-unit.source: Generates types and attribute declarations from internal type mapping information for XML schema element declarations.
The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> class generates .NET Framework types or attribute declarations from internal mappings to .NET Framework types.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> clase genera tipos de .NET Framework o declaraciones de atributos de las asignaciones internas a los tipos de .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: These internal mappings are generated by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> class for elements defined in an XSD document or as parts in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: Estas asignaciones internas generadas por la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> clase para los elementos definidos en un documento XSD o como elementos en un documento de lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (WSDL).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> is not used directly; it is used with the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) or the XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> no se utiliza directamente; se utiliza con la herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) o la herramienta de definición de esquemas XML (Xsd.exe).

trans-unit.source: Wsdl.exe uses the types or attribute declarations that are generated by <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> and the internal mappings generated by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> class to generate client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: WSDL.exe usa los tipos o las declaraciones de atributo que se generan por <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> y las asignaciones internas generadas por la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> clase para generar clases de proxy cliente o clases de servidor abstractas de un documento WSDL.

trans-unit.source: Wsdl.exe uses <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> and the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class when a WSDL document specifies:
trans-unit.target: Utiliza WSDL.exe <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> y <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> clase cuando se especifica un documento WSDL:

trans-unit.source: Literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions.
trans-unit.target: Uso literal, indicando que el contenido de los parámetros de mensaje SOAP y los valores devueltos (o documentos de solicitud y respuesta) se especifica literalmente con las definiciones de esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: Non-SOAP implementations of Web services using the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.
trans-unit.target: Implementaciones de servicios Web mediante las operaciones HTTP-GET y HTTP-POST no SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Xsd.exe uses <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> to generate classes from XML Schema Definition (XSD) documents.
trans-unit.target: XSD.exe utiliza <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> para generar clases a partir de documentos de definición de esquemas XML (XSD).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter" /> class.
The namespace of the types to generate.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter" /> class using the specified namespace.

Instead of creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> class directly, use the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) or the XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe).
trans-unit.target: En lugar de crear una instancia de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> clase directamente, utilice la herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) o la herramienta de definición de esquemas XML (Xsd.exe).

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the types to generate.
A CodeDOM graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter" /> class using the specified namespace and code compile unit.

Instead of creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> class directly, use the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) or the XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe).
trans-unit.target: En lugar de crear una instancia de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> clase directamente, utilice la herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) o la herramienta de definición de esquemas XML (Xsd.exe).

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the types to generate.
A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" /> program graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
An enumeration value that provides options for generating .NET Framework types from XML schema custom data types.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter" /> class using the specified namespace, code compile unit, and code generation options.

Instead of creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> class directly, use the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) or the XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe).
trans-unit.target: En lugar de crear una instancia de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> clase directamente, utilice la herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) o la herramienta de definición de esquemas XML (Xsd.exe).

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the types to generate.
A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" /> program graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
An enumeration value that provides options for generating .NET Framework types from XML schema custom data types.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping" /> objects.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter" /> class using the specified .NET Framework namespace, code compile unit containing the graph of the objects, an object representing code generation options, and a collection of mapping objects.
The namespace of the types to generate.
A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" /> program graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
An enumeration value that provides options for generating .NET Framework types from XML schema custom data types.
A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions" /> that contains special instructions for code creation.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping" /> objects.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter" /> class using the specified .NET Framework namespace, code compile unit containing the graph of the objects, an enumeration specifying code options, and a collection of mapping objects.

Adds an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a <see langword="&lt;part&gt;" /> element of a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
The collection of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.
An internal .NET Framework type mapping for a single element part of a WSDL message definition.
The XML namespace of the SOAP message part for which the type mapping information in the member parameter has been generated.

Adds an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a <see langword="<part>" /> element of a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

This method is used by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) when a WSDL document specifies literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions.
trans-unit.target: Este método se usa por la herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) cuando un documento WSDL especifica un uso literal, indicando que el contenido de los parámetros de mensaje SOAP y los valores devueltos (o documentos de solicitud y respuesta) se especifican literalmente con las definiciones de esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.
The internal .NET Framework type mapping information for an XML schema element.
The XML namespace of the SOAP message part for which the type mapping information in the member parameter has been generated.

Adds an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> declaration to a method return value that corresponds to a <see langword="<part>" /> element of a non-SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method when a WSDL document specifies the .NET Framework's non-SOAP implementations of Web services using the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.
trans-unit.target: La herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) usa este método cuando un documento WSDL especifica implementaciones no SOAP de .NET Framework de servicios Web mediante las operaciones HTTP-GET y HTTP-POST.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration" /> objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.
An internal .NET Framework type mapping for a single element part of a WSDL message definition.
The XML namespace of the SOAP message part for which the type mapping information in the member parameter has been generated.
Flag that helps determine whether to add an initial argument containing the XML element name for the attribute declaration being generated.

Adds an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a <see langword="<part>" /> element of a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method when a WSDL document specifies literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions.
trans-unit.target: La herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) usa este método cuando un documento WSDL especifica un uso literal, lo que indica que el contenido de los parámetros de mensajes SOAP y valores devueltos (o documentos de solicitud y respuesta) se especifican literalmente con las definiciones de esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: The internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.
Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for each of the parts that belong to a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method when a WSDL document specifies literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions.
trans-unit.target: La herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) usa este método cuando un documento WSDL especifica un uso literal, lo que indica que el contenido de los parámetros de mensajes SOAP y valores devueltos (o documentos de solicitud y respuesta) se especifican literalmente con las definiciones de esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: The internal .NET Framework type mapping information for an XML schema element.
Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for an XML schema element.

The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method to generate SOAP message headers and return types when a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document specifies non-SOAP implementations of Web services using the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.
trans-unit.target: La herramienta Lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (Wsdl.exe) usa este método para generar encabezados de mensajes SOAP y tipos devueltos cuando un documento de lenguaje de descripción de servicios Web (WSDL) especifica implementaciones no SOAP de servicios Web mediante las operaciones de HTTP-POST y HTTP-GET.

trans-unit.source: The XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe) uses this method to generate each of the XML schema element declarations in an XML Schema Definition (XSD) document.
trans-unit.target: La herramienta de definición de esquemas XML (Xsd.exe) usa este método para generar cada una de las declaraciones de elemento de esquema XML en un documento de definición de esquemas XML (XSD).
